name: basic-vite-react
label: Basic Template

name: 2d-phaser-sprite-character-gravity
label: 2D Phaser Sprite Character Gravity Template

name: basic-3d-freeview
label: 3D Character Freeview Template
description: Template for implementing 3D game with map and character. Features character system and freeview camera system. Use for general and default 3D game with map and character.

label: 3D Multiplay Template
description: Template for implementing 3D game with map and character. Features character and freeview camera and multiplay system. Use for general 3D multiplay game with map and character.
